comments.author: John Farrar
comments.message: Hey, appreciate the comments. Could you add more detail to what you would like for code highlighting? (Working on second book and plan on updating this for next version of ColdFusion.)

comments.author: Akbarsait
comments.message:
Hi John,

I would like to have code samples in different color or highlighted with different borders which make code samples more readable.

comments.author: kevin
comments.message: This is really a good book for get start with CF 8 features.
